ReaganDialogue: ^REAGAN: Greetings! Enjoying your time here at the festival?
^CIELLE: Yes! We are, thank you! This... is a lot of pottery!
^REAGAN: These are all made with love by our craftsperson Maeve! She really takes pride in what she creates.
^COSMO: I can see that! Though wouldn’t they get really bored making the same sort of stuff over and over again?
^CIELLE: Well if it’s a passion, then surely she wouldn’t mind... Just look at all these things!
TheRest: ^CIELLE: What do you guys use them for?
^REAGAN: Oh, for a variety of things! A majority of them are used for holding food that can be found all around the market.
^REAGAN: They're not just for the Calmaaj people, but for everyone! There are also a bunch of decorative pieces that are purely for show!
^CIELLE: Yeah, I would guess that food is a large part of it... the smell around here is amazing with all the produce and cooking going on.
^REAGAN: If you're interested in learning about the food and culture, try looking for a large guy around here!
^REAGAN: His knowledge on food is simply the best! It’s not surprising considering he is the market’s Culinary Overseer...
